title: The Project Proponent/s shall apply to the concerned head of the Branch office of the Town Planning Department (1) or to the Authority, as the case may be, for grant of building permission, alongwith all relevant documents and attested copy of Environment Clearance for the project from MoEF or the Authority empowered by the MoEF
clause_text: The Project Proponent/s shall apply to the concerned head of the Branch office of the Town Planning Department (1) or to the Authority, as the case may be, for grant of building permission, alongwith all relevant documents and attested copy of Environment Clearance for the project from MoEF or the Authority empowered by the MoEF.
section: Master Layout Plan Approval by the Collector (1) or by the Planning Authority, as the case may be :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
